short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can earn cashback from purchases on various e-commerce platforms, as well as booking accommodations, tours, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tripster's Cashback program is easy and convenient to use. Everyone can receive cashback from purchases made through various e-commerce platforms, including paying utility bills, buying products online, booking accommodations, hotels, tours, and various trips with our partners. Whether it's Lazada, Shopee, Agoda, Booking.com, Klook, Amazon, and many other simple channels. Additionally, you can also enjoy various special privileges and exclusive promotions.
